alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 12 at 10:31AM MDT until July 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 99 and 102 expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
